title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
synopsis: Ferris convinces his entire school he's at death's door, then hits the streets of Chicago with his girlfriend and best friend for a day of fun.

title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
synopsis: David Fincher directs this Oscar-nominated tale of Benjamin Button, a man who was born old and wrinkled but grows younger as the years go by.

title: Drive
synopsis: A Hollywood stuntman and getaway driver is lured from his isolated life by a lovely neighbor -- until her violent husband is released from prison.

title: My Life as a Zucchini
synopsis: A 9-year-old boy finds his life upended when he's sent to live in an orphanage in this stop-motion animated tale of loss, friendship and young love.

title: Forks Over Knives
synopsis: According to the research of two food scientists, the popularity of processed foods has led to epidemic rates of obesity, diabetes and other diseases.

title: Jim Gaffigan: Mr. Universe
synopsis: Funnyman Jim Gaffigan offers up his unique take on everything from Disney World to overweight whales in this live show from Washington, D.C.

title: Rock On!!
synopsis: Four friends hoped that their rock band would be a hit. After breaking up, the band members reunite and take another shot at fulfilling their dream.

title: Tom Segura: Completely Normal
synopsis: Levelheaded stand-up Tom Segura shares offhand appraisals on hotels and opens up about his hobbies and digestive ailments in this comedy special.

title: Scooby-Doo on Zombie Island
synopsis: When Daphne's TV show does a segment on real monsters, the gang fires up the Mystery Machine and heads to Moonscar Island, where zombies await.

title: Sergio
synopsis: This moving documentary profiles Sergio Viera de Mello, the charismatic U.N. High Commissioner of Human Rights, who was killed by terrorists in Iraq.

title: About Time
synopsis: When Tim learns that the men in his family can travel in time and change their own lives, he decides to go back and win the woman of his dreams.

title: The Pixar Story
synopsis: Go behind the scenes at Pixar Animation Studios with this Emmy-nominated documentary tracing the creation and history of the groundbreaking company.

title: Anthony Jeselnik: Thoughts and Prayers
synopsis: There's no subject too dark as the comedian skewers taboos and riffs on national tragedies before pulling back the curtain on his provocative style.

title: BERSERK: The Golden Age Arc II - The Battle for Doldrey
synopsis: For three years, Guts believed his mission was to pursue Griffith's dream together with him. But in order to become Griffith's equal and truly be called his friend, Guts realizes he will have to leave the Band of the Hawk.

title: Marco Polo: One Hundred Eyes
synopsis: A defiant warrior-monk arrives at Kublai Khan's court in chains and soon earns his tragic nickname in this 30-minute origin story.

title: Amy
synopsis: Rare home videos and interviews with Amy Winehouse's inner circle offer an intimate look at her journey from charismatic teen to troubled star.

title: Tu Hai Mera Sunday
synopsis: When their Sunday soccer game on the beach is canceled, five friends set out to find another place to play in the noisy, crowded city of Mumbai.

title: The Hateful Eight
synopsis: Years after the Civil War, a bounty hunter and his captive are waylaid by a Wyoming blizzard and hole up in a way station with six dicey strangers.

title: On Yoga The Architecture of Peace
synopsis: Based on photographer Michael O’Neill’s book of the same name, this documentary traces the author’s 10-year journey through the landscape of yoga.

title: Jim Gaffigan: King Baby
synopsis: Jim Gaffigan offers up his take on bacon, bowling and other weighty topics in this stand-up performance filmed live in Austin on his 2008 comedy tour.

title: Louis C.K.: Live at the Comedy Store
synopsis: The comic puts his trademark hilarious/thought-provoking spin on finding a bat in his kitchen, seeing rats having sex, Boston accents and dead pets.

title: The Butterfly's Dream
synopsis: Forced to work in a coal mine during World War II, two young poets find some escape when they both fall for the same woman.

title: When Two Worlds Collide
synopsis: This documentary takes a hard look at how indigenous peoples clashed violently with the Peruvian government over land and economics in the Amazon.

title: A Christmas Special: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug and Cat Noir
synopsis: Parisian teen Marinette transforms herself into superhero Ladybug to find her lonely secret crush Adrien when he runs away from home at Christmas.

title: Udta Punjab
synopsis: Drug abuse and the darker side of Punjab rear their heads in the intense, interwoven tales of a cop, a doctor, a migrant worker and a rock star.

title: Tiger
synopsis: Aging boxer Ramón regains his vitality when he meets fierce young boxer Deborah, their unbridled passion causing him to forsake everyone around him.

title: Kabhi Haan Kabhi Naa
synopsis: A complicated love triangle develops when happy-go-lucky Sunil falls for his lovely bandmate Anna, but she's only got eyes for the wealthy Chris.

title: Oh, Hello On Broadway
synopsis: Two delusional geriatrics reveal curious pasts, share a love of tuna and welcome a surprise guest in this filming of the popular Broadway comedy show.

title: Moor
synopsis: A railway stationmaster tries to cope with his wife's death, his estrangement from his son and the corrupt world in which he lives.

title: In This Corner of the World
synopsis: Suzu marries into a family living outside of Hiroshima and quickly settles into her new life, until World War II challenges her ability to survive.

title: A Billion Colour Story
synopsis: The curious child of idealistic interfaith parents observes an increasingly intolerant world as his family faces financial strain.

title: Derren Brown: Miracle
synopsis: Illusionist Derren Brown reinvents the concept of 'faith healing” through a series of stunts that debunk the confines of fear, pain and disbelief.

title: Kita Kita
synopsis: When a tour guide in Japan goes blind after seeing her fiancé’s infidelity, she befriends a fellow Filipino keen to coax her out of the darkness.

title: The Rainbow Troops
synopsis: Two Indonesian teachers embrace an inspiring crop of gifted young students who've come to study at their crumbling Islamic primary school.

title: Sanju
synopsis: From the depths of addiction to the heights of stardom to underworld entanglements, this biopic traces the checkered past of Indian actor Sanjay Dutt.

title: Among Family
synopsis: Amid a marital crisis, Fikret befriends songstress Solmaz after a wacky encounter and must fill in as the father of her soon-to-wed daughter.

title: What's Up With Love?
synopsis: A popular high school girl strains her relationship with her close-knit clique when she begins falling for a reclusive, lower-class schoolmate.

title: The Devil We Know
synopsis: This documentary details DuPont's alleged decades-long cover-up of the potential harm caused by chemicals used to make popular Teflon products.

title: Hamid
synopsis: Wanting his missing father to come home, a Kashmiri boy repeatedly attempts to call God for help -- until one day, a hardened army officer picks up.

title: Ee Nagaraniki Emaindi
synopsis: In Goa and in desperate need of cash, four childhood friends get another shot at making their long-abandoned dreams of becoming filmmakers come true.

title: Union Leader
synopsis: Toxic conditions and a corrupt union leader prompt a chemical plant worker and earnest family man to fight for justice for his fellow laborers.

title: Don
synopsis: A man who's a lookalike for a slain mob kingpin is asked by the police to impersonate the gangster and infiltrate his underworld organization.

title: Betty White: First Lady of Television
synopsis: This documentary on actress and television producer Betty White traces her decades-long career as a  woman breaking new ground in entertainment.

title: Guru
synopsis: Ambitious Gurukant Desai ignores his father's advice and leaves his village to find success in Turkey.

title: Katt Williams: The Pimp Chronicles: Pt. 1
synopsis: In this 2006 show, comic Katt Williams uses his edgy style and personal experiences to paint a sassy, hilarious portrait of life in black America.

title: Silver Linings Playbook
synopsis: After a stint in a mental hospital, Pat moves in with his parents and tries to win back his wife, until he meets a woman who's as unstable as he is.

title: The Last Samurai
synopsis: An American hired to instruct the Japanese army in the ways of modern warfare soon learns to respect the samurai that he has been ordered to destroy.

title: The Social Network
synopsis: Director David Fincher's biographical drama chronicles the meteoric rise of Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg from Harvard sophomore to Internet superstar.

title: Road to Perdition
synopsis: After his wife and son are murdered, a Depression-era hit man goes on the run with his surviving son to exact revenge on the man who wronged him.

title: Blue Is the Warmest Color
synopsis: Determined to fall in love, 15-year-old Adele is focused on boys. But it's a blue-haired girl she meets on the street who really piques her interest.

title: Kevin Hart: I'm a Grown Little Man
synopsis: Stand-up comedy star Kevin Hart delivers his unique perspective on work, race, family and friends with this laugh-riot comedy show.

title: Undefeated
synopsis: An inspirational profile of an inner-city high school football team's valiant effort to reach the school's first-ever playoff game.

title: As Good as It Gets
synopsis: The structured world of a sour, obsessive-compulsive author crumbles when he's drawn into the lives of a stressed-out single mom and his gay neighbor.

title: Philadelphia
synopsis: Philadelphia attorney Andrew Beckett launches a wrongful termination suit against his law firm when they fire him because he's gay and HIV-positive.

title: Kung Fu Hustle
synopsis: Sing, a mobster in 1940s China, longs to be as cool as the formally clad Axe Gang, a band of killers who rule Hong Kong, but can only pretend.

title: The 36th Chamber Of Shaolin
synopsis: After a corrupt general occupies his village and terrorizes his family, San Te vows revenge and leaves home to study the ancient fighting arts.

title: Beasts of No Nation
synopsis: When civil war tears his family apart, a young West African boy is forced to join a unit of mercenary fighters and transform into a child soldier.

title: Ex Machina
synopsis: A coder at a tech company wins a week-long retreat at the compound of his company's CEO, where he's tasked with testing a new artificial intelligence.

title: Kuch Kuch Hota Hai
synopsis: A girl tracks down her widowed dad's college best friend, believing they're meant to be together. But the woman is already engaged to another man.

title: The Fear of 13
synopsis: After 20 years on Death Row, self-educated inmate Nick petitions the court to be executed, then tells his twisting, turning tale of despair and hope.

title: Only the Dead
synopsis: Given unprecedented access to soldiers and terrorists alike, journalist Michael Ware presents an epic, uncensored, intimate account of the Iraq War.

title: The Breadwinner
synopsis: A courageous 11-year-old Afghan girl disguises herself as a boy and takes on odd jobs to provide for her family when her father is arrested.

title: Jim Jefferies: Freedumb
synopsis: Returning for a second Netflix comedy special, Jim Jefferies unleashes his famously ferocious black humor to a packed house in Nashville, Tennessee.

title: The Theory of Everything
synopsis: As his esteem grows in the world of physics, Stephen Hawking's body is ravaged by ALS, forcing his increasing dependence on his devoted wife, Jane.

title: The Little Prince
synopsis: When an overscheduled girl befriends an eccentric aviator, he regales her with tales about the adventures of an unusual boy who lives on an asteroid.

title: Elena
synopsis: In this documentary, the director remembers a sister who left behind her life under Brazil’s dictatorship and moved to New York with dreams of acting.

title: Lupin the 3rd: The Castle of Cagliostro: Special Edition
synopsis: Lupin, his sidekick, Jigen, and the samurai warrior Goemon set out to take over an evil counterfeit operation at Count Cagliostro's fortress.

title: Jim and Andy: The Great Beyond - Featuring a Very Special, Contractually Obligated Mention of Tony Clifton
synopsis: Through the lens of his stunningly immersive performance as Andy Kaufman, Jim Carrey ponders the meaning of life, reality, identity and career.

title: Best Worst Thing That Ever Could Have Happened
synopsis: The cast and crew of the 1981 Broadway musical 'Merrily We Roll Along' recall joy and heartbreak during the production of a surefire hit that wasn't.

title: Elizabeth at 90: A Family Tribute
synopsis: A blend of the royal family's intimate recollections and rarely seen home movies pays tribute to Queen Elizabeth II on the eve of her 90th birthday.

title: Unrest
synopsis: In this heart-wrenching documentary, a 28-year-old Ph.D. student turns the camera on herself to capture her struggles with chronic fatigue syndrome.

title: Madras Café
synopsis: An Indian intelligence agent journeys to a war-torn coastal island to break a resolute rebel group and meets a passionate journalist.

title: Williams
synopsis: This inspiring documentary charts the birth of Sir Frank Williams's renowned racing empire -- and the near-fatal crash that nearly stalled its future.

title: Let It Fall: Los Angeles 1982-1992
synopsis: This documentary chronicles simmering tension and broken trust between L.A.'s black community and police in the decade before the Rodney King riots.

title: Operation Odessa
synopsis: A Russian mobster, a Cuban spy and a smooth operator from Miami scheme to sell a Soviet submarine to a Colombian drug cartel for $35 million.

title: The Meaning of Monty Python
synopsis: Five Pythons reflect on their creative process, politics, television and the making of their award-winning final film, 'The Meaning of Life.'

title: Monty Python Live (Mostly): One Down, Five to Go
synopsis: Live from London in a sold-out final show, surviving members of the British comedy troupe reprise old roles and break out in irreverent song and dance.
Mixing old footage with interviews, this is the story of Arsenal's improbable win versus Liverpool in the final moments of the 1989 championship game.

title: Maktub
synopsis: After surviving a bomb attack, two low-level mobsters in Jerusalem change their ways and set about making strangers' Wailing Wall prayers come true.

title: Parmanu: The Story of Pokhran
synopsis: A dedicated government official puts his career in jeopardy by insisting that India become a nuclear power, a goal that powerful forces resist.

title: The Bleeding Edge
synopsis: This eye-opening look at the fast-growing medical device industry reveals how the rush to innovate can lead to devastating consequences for patients.

title: Mersal
synopsis: A detective arrests a doctor for crimes targeting medical professionals but later finds the real culprit in a tale of revenge, corruption and magic.

title: One Day
synopsis: When his colleague (and crush) temporarily loses her memory, an overlooked geek seizes the chance to make an impression before she remembers again.

title: ROMA
synopsis: Director Alfonso Cuarón delivers a vivid, emotional portrait of domestic life and social hierarchy set against Mexico's political turmoil of the 1970s.

title: Oye Lucky! Lucky Oye!
synopsis: Starting as a petty thief, a man rises to become one of the city's biggest operators and carves out the kind of lifestyle he'd once only dreamed of.

title: Mumbai Meri Jaan
synopsis: A moving portrayal of the 2006 train bombings in Mumbai, this Indian drama follows the interconnected stories of several strangers.

title: Heneral Luna
synopsis: Flashbacks reveal Gen. Antonio Luna's tireless fight for Filipino independence from the U.S. and his leadership in the Philippine-American War in 1899.

title: Aamir
synopsis: In this high-tension thriller, an anonymous caller on a cell phone threatens to harm a man's family if he doesn't carry out every order.

title: Bathtubs Over Broadway
synopsis: A comedy writer for David Letterman unearths a hidden world of hilariously bizarre musicals, which turns into a toe-tapping obsession.

title: Brené Brown: The Call to Courage
synopsis: With humor and empathy, Brené Brown discusses what it takes to choose courage over comfort in a culture defined by scarcity, fear and uncertainty.

title: Njan Prakashan
synopsis: Yearning for a lavish life abroad, an entitled, lazy sexist crafts a scam to ditch his thankless nursing job and find a wealthy spouse to secure a visa.

title: Last Breath
synopsis: A commercial diver becomes trapped on the ocean floor with dwindling oxygen and little hope of a timely rescue, so he tries to save himself.

title: Rolling Thunder Revue: A Bob Dylan Story by Martin Scorsese
synopsis: In an alchemic mix of fact and fantasy, Martin Scorsese looks back at Bob Dylan's 1975 Rolling Thunder Revue tour and a country ripe for reinvention.

title: Tell Me Who I Am
synopsis: In this documentary, Alex trusts his twin, Marcus, to tell him about his past after he loses his memory. But Marcus is hiding a dark family secret.

title: Mike Birbiglia: The New One
synopsis: Comedian Mike Birbiglia hits Broadway with a hilarious yet profound one-man show that recounts his emotional and physical journey to parenthood.

title: Khubsoorat
synopsis: A strict matriarch's regimented household is upended by the arrival of a spunky relative who challenges the rules.

title: A Sun
synopsis: A family reckons with the aftermath of their younger son's incarceration and a greater misfortune that follows.

title: Agneepath
synopsis: A boy grows up to become a gangster in pursuit of the mobster who killed his innocent father, but revenge and reparation may come at great costs.

title: Material
synopsis: A dutiful son must hide his pursuit of stand-up comedy from his staunch father, who expects him to inherit his store and uphold their Muslim beliefs.

title: Blow
synopsis: Cocaine smuggler George rises from poverty to become one of the biggest drug dealers in America before his eventual downfall.
